action.name: Terminal
action.description: Opens a new terminal in the current directory.

action.name: Extract
action.command: sh -c 'for f in %F; do dirname=$(basename "$f" .tar.gz); dirname=$(basename "$dirname" .tar); dirname=$(basename "$dirname" .zip); mkdir "$dirname" && tar -xf "$f" -C "$dirname" || unzip "$f" -d "$dirname" && rm "$f"; done'
action.description: Extracts to a new folder and deletes the archive.

action.name: Archive
action.description: Makes a gzipped tarball with the selected items.
